name: The Space (SemPruijs)
description:
In the space, your goal is to find all the six children. These children are lost in spaces and you need to help them! They are scared because there are monsters everywhere!

Help these six children!

This game is made for the LMOB BEGGINER JAM #24

I am really grateful that I could participate in this jam, special thanks to the host of this jam.

Make sure you press space in the main menu and not clicking on press space.

Credits:

This game is made by Sem Pruijs

The color pallet is made by Slynyrd

The font is designed by Yoshimichi Ohira

Special thanks to Silvan for making the monster sprites : )

If the game does not load for some reason you can also play it here
